verses.t: Therefore{G5620}, my{G3450} brethren{G80} dearly beloved{G27} and{G2532} longed for{G1973}, my{G3450} joy{G5479} and{G2532} crown{G4735}, so{G3779} stand fast{G4739} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}, my dearly beloved{G27}.
I beseech{G3870} Euodias{G2136}, and{G2532} beseech{G3870} Syntyche{G4941}, that they be of the same mind in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}.

And{G2532} I intreat{G2065} thee{G4571} also{G2532}, true{G1103} yokefellow{G4805}, help{G4815} those women{G846} which{G3748} laboured{G4866} with me{G3427} in{G1722} the gospel{G3588}, with{G3326} Clement{G2815} also{G2532}, and{G2532} with other{G3062} my{G3450} fellowlabourers{G4904}, whose{G3739} names{G3588} are in{G1722} the book{G976} of life{G2222}.
Rejoice{G5463} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962} alway{G3842}: and again{G3825} I say{G2046}, Rejoice{G5463}.
Let{G1097} your{G5216} moderation{G1933} be known{G1097} unto{G444} all{G3956} men{G444}. The Lord{G3588} is at hand{G1451}.

Be careful{G3309} for nothing{G3367}; but{G235} in{G1722} every thing{G3956} by prayer{G3588} and{G2532} supplication{G3588} with{G3326} thanksgiving{G2169} let{G1107} your{G5216} requests{G3588} be made known{G1107} unto{G4314} God{G3588}.

And{G2532} the peace{G3588} of God{G3588}, which passeth{G5242} all{G3956} understanding{G3563}, shall keep{G5432} your{G5216} hearts{G3588} and{G2532} minds{G3588} through{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}.

Finally{G3063}, brethren{G80}, whatsoever things{G3745} are{G2076} true{G227}, whatsoever things{G3745} are honest{G4586}, whatsoever things{G3745} are just{G1342}whatsoever things{G3745} are pure{G53}, whatsoever things{G3745} are lovely{G4375}, whatsoever things{G3745} are of good report{G2163}; if{G1487} there be any{G5100} virtue{G703}, and{G2532} if{G1487} there be any{G5100} praise{G1868}, think on{G3049} these things{G5023}.

Those things{G5023}, which{G3739} ye have{G3129} both{G2532} learned{G3129}, and{G2532} received{G3880}, and{G2532} heard{G191}, and{G2532} seen{G1492} in{G1722} me{G1698}, do{G4238}: and{G2532} the God{G3588} of peace{G3588} shall be{G2071} with{G3326} you{G5216}.

But{G1161} I rejoiced{G5463} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962} greatly{G3171}, that{G3754} now{G2235} at the last{G4218} your care{G5426} of{G5228} me{G1700} hath flourished{G330} again; where{G3739}in{G1909} ye were{G5426} also{G2532} careful{G5426}, but{G1161} ye lacked opportunity{G170}.
Not{G3756} that{G3754} I speak{G3004} in respect of{G2596} want{G5304}: for{G1063} I{G1473} have learned{G3129}, in{G1722} whatsoever{G3739} state I am{G1510}, therewith to be{G1511} content{G842}.

I know{G1492} both{G2532} how{G1492} to be abased{G5013}, and{G2532} I know how{G1492} to abound{G4052}: every where{G3956} and{G2532} in{G1722} all things{G3956} I am instructed{G3453} both{G2532} to be full{G5526} and{G2532} to be hungry{G3983}, both{G2532} to abound{G4052} and{G2532} to suffer need{G5302}.
I can do{G2480} all things{G3956} through{G1722} Christ{G5547} which{G3588} strengtheneth{G1743} me{G3165}.
Notwithstanding{G4133} ye have{G4160} well{G2573} done{G4160}, that ye did communicate{G4790} with{G3588} my{G3450} affliction{G2347}.

Now{G1161} ye{G5210} Philippians{G5374} know{G1492} also{G2532}, that{G3754} in{G1722} the beginning{G746} of the gospel{G3588}, when{G3753} I departed{G1831} from{G575} Macedonia{G3109}, no{G3762} church{G1577} communicated with{G2841} me{G3427} as{G1519} concerning{G3056} giving{G1394} and{G2532} receiving{G3028}, but{G3361} ye{G5210} only{G3441}.
For{G3754} even{G2532} in{G1722} Thessalonica{G2332} ye sent{G3992} once{G530} and{G2532} again{G1364} unto{G1519} my{G3427} necessity{G3588}.
Not{G3756} because{G3754} I desire{G1934} a gift{G3588}: but{G235} I desire{G1934} fruit{G3588} that may abound{G4121} to{G1519} your{G5216} account{G3056}.

But{G1161} I have{G568} all{G3956}, and{G2532} abound{G4052}: I am full{G4137}, having received{G1209} of{G3844} Epaphroditus{G1891} the things{G3588} which were sent from{G3844} you{G5216}, an odour{G3744} of a sweet smell{G2175}, a sacrifice{G2378} acceptable{G1184}, wellpleasing{G2101} to God{G3588}.
But{G1161} my{G3450} God{G2316} shall supply{G4137} all{G3956} your{G5216} need{G5532} according to{G2596} his{G846} riches{G3588} in{G1722} glory{G1391} by{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}.
Now{G1161} unto God{G2316} and{G2532} our{G2257} Father{G3962} be glory{G3588} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}. Amen{G281}.
Salute{G782} every{G3956} saint{G40} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}The brethren which are{G80} with{G4862} me{G1698} greet{G782} you{G5209}.
All{G3956} the saints{G40} salute{G782} you{G5209}, chiefly{G3122} they that are{G3588} of{G1537} Caesar's{G2541} household{G3614}.
